alert.note: Alert for Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 22 at 4:06PM CDT until July 22 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Southwestern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Eastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 405 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Bruin, or near St. Joseph, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... St. Joseph around 410 PM CDT. Alcorn State around 425 PM CDT. Lorman around 440 PM CDT. Fayette and Red Lick around 450 PM CDT. Blue Hill around 500 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
